info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 30 at 7:08PM CDT until April 30 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Will County in northeastern Illinois... Western Kankakee County in northeastern Illinois... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 708 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Dwight, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kankakee, Bourbonnais, Bradley, Manteno, Peotone, Herscher, Limestone, Lakewood Shores, Essex, Bonfield, Buckingham, Cabery and Union Hill. Including the following interstate... I-57 between mile markers 314 and 330. This includes... Kankakee River State Park, Olivet Nazarine University, and Will County Fairgrounds. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northeastern and east central Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northeastern and east central Illinois.
